General.Name: Shah Alloys Limited
General.Description: Shah Alloys Limited manufactures and sells flat and long stainless steel, alloy and special steel, carbon/mild steel, and armor steel products in India and internationally. The company offers hot rolled coils, hot rolled sheets/plates, cold rolled coils and sheets, hot rolled round bars, bright round bars, hot rolled flat bars, peeled bars, and angles, beams, etc. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Gandhinagar, India.
General.Address: Shah Alloys Corporate House, Gandhinagar, India, 382721
